sentences.text: Starting from this staging, the World Championship will be expanded to include 32 teams, increasing from 24 teams. The tournament will thus also be held biannually instead of quadrennially.

references.text: <ref>{{cite press release |title=FIVB Volleyball World Championships to expand to 32-teams per gender and enhance competition formula |url=https://www.fivb.com/en/media/news_pressrelease/fivb-volleyball-world-championships-to-expand-to?id=100250 |access-date=9 July 2023 |publisher=FIVB |date=15 October 2022 |archive-date=9 July 2023 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230709093203/https://www.fivb.com/en/media/news_pressrelease/fivb-volleyball-world-championships-to-expand-to?id=100250 |url-status=live}}</ref>

sentences.text:
Around 31 countries expressed interest to host the tournament. This figure was reduced to three final candidates: Indonesia, Japan and the Philippines.
* {{INA}}
* {{JPN}}<ref name="ph-host" />
* '''{{PHI}}'''<ref name="ph-host" />

sentences.text: On 20 March 2024, FIVB announced that the Philippines will host the tournament.

references.text: <ref>{{Cite web |title=Philippines locks in hosting rights for Men's World Championship 2025 |url=https://en.volleyballworld.com/news/philippines-locks-in-hosting-rights-for-men-s-world-championship-2025 |website=Volleyball World |date=20 March 2024 |access-date=20 March 2024 |archive-date=20 March 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240320124618/https://en.volleyballworld.com/news/philippines-locks-in-hosting-rights-for-men-s-world-championship-2025 |url-status=live}}</ref>

sentences.text:
{{main|2025 FIVB Men's Volleyball World Championship qualification}}

The host country Philippines men's national volleyball team|Philippines qualified for the competition as well as the defending champions Italy men's national volleyball team|Italy. The top three teams from each of the 2023 Continental Championships secured qualification. The final 15 places belonged to top 15 teams as per FIVB Senior World Rankings|FIVB World Ranking who had not yet qualified.

references.text: <ref>{{cite news |title=Volleyball Calendar 2025-2028 Approved By The FIVB Board Of Administration |url=https://www.fivb.com/en/about/news/volleyball-calendar-2025-2028-approved-by-the-fivb?id=100917 |access-date=25 July 2023 |date=22 June 2023 |archive-date=29 June 2023 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230629203821/https://www.fivb.com/en/about/news/volleyball-calendar-2025-2028-approved-by-the-fivb?id=100917 |url-status=live}}</ref>

sentences.text: The 32 teams were distributed to eight pools of four teams. The draw of lots took place at Solaire Resort & Casino|Solaire Hotel in Parañaque on 14 September 2024. Rankings of teams are shown in brackets.

references.text: <ref>{{cite web |last=Dioquino |first=Delfin |title=Manny Pangilinan commits to support PH hosting of 2025 FIVB Men's World Championship |url=https://www.rappler.com/sports/volleyball/manny-pangilinan-commits-support-philippines-hosting-fivb-men-world-championship-2025/ |access-date=28 August 2024 |website=Rappler |date=26 August 2024 |archive-date=28 August 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240828023659/https://www.rappler.com/sports/volleyball/manny-pangilinan-commits-support-philippines-hosting-fivb-men-world-championship-2025/ |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref>{{cite web |last=Cadayona |first=Russell |title=2025 FIVB men’s world championship draw ngayon |trans-title=2025 FIVB men’s world championship draw today |url=https://www.philstar.com/pilipino-star-ngayon/palaro/2024/09/14/2385122/2025-fivb-mens-world-championship-draw-ngayon |work=Pilipino Star Ngayon |publisher=The Philippine Star |access-date=14 September 2024 |language=fil |date=14 September 2024 |archive-date=14 September 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240914003020/https://www.philstar.com/pilipino-star-ngayon/palaro/2024/09/14/2385122/2025-fivb-mens-world-championship-draw-ngayon |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref>{{Cite web |last= |date=14 September 2024 |title=Men’s World Championship draw sets stage for exciting competition |url=https://en.volleyballworld.com/volleyball/competitions/men-world-championship/news/men-s-world-championship-draw-sets-stage-for-exciting-competition |access-date=2025-01-09 |website=Volleyball World}}</ref>

sentences.text: The host and the top seven teams are automatically seeded as the first teams of the eight pools.

references.text: <ref>{{cite web |title=2025 Men's World Championship pools to be drawn on September 14 |url=https://en.volleyballworld.com/volleyball/competitions/men-world-championship/news/2025-men-s-world-championship-pools-to-be-drawn-on-september-14 |website=Volleyball World |access-date=5 September 2024 |date=4 September 2024 |archive-date=14 September 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240914150818/https://en.volleyballworld.com/volleyball/competitions/men-world-championship/news/2025-men-s-world-championship-pools-to-be-drawn-on-september-14 |url-status=live}}</ref>

sentences.text:
{{OSM Location map | coord = {{coord|14.66|121}} | zoom = 10 | width = 220 | height = 300 | mark-size1 = 16 | shape1 = n-circle | shape-color1 = #2B2776 | shape-color2 = #2B2776 | shape-color3 = #2B2776 | caption = Host venues of the FIVB Men's Volleyball World Championship in the Greater Manila Area
{{Ubl | {{#invoke:overlay|icon|1|#2B2776}} Pasay | {{#invoke:overlay|icon|2|#2B2776}} Quezon City }}
| mark-coord1 = {{Coord|14.532448|120.983686}} | mark-title1 = Pasay | mark-description1 = SM Mall of Asia Arena | mark-coord2 = {{Coord|14.620769|121.053398}} | mark-title2 = Quezon City | mark-description2 = Araneta Coliseum }} The tournament will have two venues in two cities in Metro Manila.{{efn|name=host-city}} Both the SM Mall of Asia Arena in Pasay and the Araneta Coliseum in Quezon City were the first two confirmed locations for the championship. There were possibilities for the finals to be held at the Mall of Asia Arena due to its capacity and the technical reasons. Other host cities would be confirmed later. The former was confirmed to be the venue for the final round matches.

references.text: <ref>{{cite news |last=Beltran |first=Nelson |title=Big Dome, MOA eyed for FIVB world meet |url=https://www.philstar.com/sports/2024/03/22/2342366/big-dome-moa-eyed-fivb-world-meet |access-date=24 March 2024 |work=The Philippine Star |date=22 March 2024 |archive-date=14 September 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240914150823/https://www.philstar.com/sports/2024/03/22/2342366/big-dome-moa-eyed-fivb-world-meet |url-status=live}}</ref>

<ref>{{cite news |last=Ulanday |first=John Bryan |title=Philippines vows hosting readiness for men's volleyball world championship |url=https://www.philstar.com/sports/2024/03/26/2343494/philippines-vows-hosting-readiness-mens-volleyball-world-championship |access-date=26 March 2024 |work=The Philippine Star |date=26 March 2024 |archive-date=28 March 2024 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240328063814/https://www.philstar.com/sports/2024/03/26/2343494/philippines-vows-hosting-readiness-mens-volleyball-world-championship |url-status=live}}</ref>

sentences.text: Additionally the PhilSports Arena|Philsports Arena in Pasig, the Filoil EcoOil Centre in San Juan, Metro Manila|San Juan, and the Ninoy Aquino Stadium and Rizal Memorial Coliseum within the Rizal Memorial Sports Complex in Manila are named as official training venues for the participating teams.

references.text: <ref>{{cite news |last1=Garcia |first1=John Mark |title=Philsports, Filoil, RMC, NAS chosen as FIVB WC training venues |url=https://www.spin.ph/volleyball/philsports-filoil-rmc-nas-chosen-as-fivb-wc-training-venues-a5172-20250111 |access-date=12 January 2025 |work=Sports Interactive Network Philippines |date=11 January 2025 |language=en}}</ref>

sentences.text: Philippines national team players Eya Laure and Bryan Bagunas were named as official ambassadors and Filipino indie band Ben&Ben was named as the official music partner in March 2025. The band's 2024 song "The Traveller Across Dimensions|Triumph" will also be used as the official song.

references.text: <ref>{{cite news |title=Laure, Bagunas, Ben&Ben tapped for Philippine hosting of men’s volleyball worlds |url=https://www.philstar.com/sports/2025/03/04/2425885/laure-bagunas-benben-tapped-philippine-hosting-mens-volleyball-worlds |access-date=6 March 2025 |work=The Philippine Star |date=4 March 2025}}</ref>
